headline: How Recent Deal Chatter Is Rewriting The Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) Investment Story
summary: The fair value estimate for Warner Bros. Discovery has been updated to US$27.25 per share from US$24.10, with a slightly lower discount rate of about 10.39% compared with 10.55%, and a revenue growth assumption now closer to 19.25% rather than 26.37%. These changes reflect how recent sale chatter, breakup scenarios, and the debate around potential bidders are feeding into analysts’ models and reshaping what some see as a reasonable long term return hurdle for the stock. Continue with this...

headline: Netflix (NFLX) Welcomes WBD Board of Directors’ Commitment To Merger Agreement
summary: Netflix, Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) is one of the Oversold Fundamentally Strong Stocks to Buy Right Now. On January 7, the company welcomed the WBD Board of Directors’ continued commitment towards the merger agreement between Netflix and WBD, and the unanimous recommendation of rejecting the revised offer from Paramount Skydance Corporation (PSKY).
